file.label: File settings
file.comment: Documentation: Extension Documentation | Google Shopping Specifications | Google Apparel Examples

feed_dir.label: Feed path:
feed_dir.comment:
• Dir path to save the feed, assure write permissions.
• Generate the feed before accessing the above URL.

locale.label: Feed Localization
locale.comment:
Your products should be in the same language as the feed, especially Google Category names.
This setting does not affect price formatting, ensure proper store language for that.

use_batch_segmentation.label: Use Batch Segmentation
use_batch_segmentation.comment:
Recommended for catalogs with tens of thousands of products.
The generator will use a limited number of products to process. Will be executed multiple times until all products are processed.

batch_limit.label: Batch Limit
batch_limit.comment:
Max number of products to be processed in a single cron job.
It depends on the number of products in catalog and the desired ussage of memory.

microdata_turned_on.label: Microdata Item Updates
microdata_turned_on.comment: Adds hidden microdata information to your product pages. To use this feature, you also need to enable Automatic Item Updates in your merchnat account.

columns.label: Columns Map
columns.comment:
Your feed depends on your store configuration, types of products, available data stored in your products and others. Some columns only accept specific values, ex: gender = ('male', 'female', 'unisex').
Please carefully read Google Shopping Specifications to find which are the possible columns and if there's any restriction for values.

Grid help:
• Order - allows you to define the columns order in the feed. Higher numbers go last.
• Feed Column - is the name of the feed as listed in the Google Shopping Specifications.
• Map To - can be either Directive (first options in the dropdown), or a product Attribute. Directives have special logic. Attributes simply grab the value from product.
• Options - some Directives accept parameters that can be specified here.

google_product_category_by_category.label: Product Category by Category Map
google_product_category_by_category.comment: Only add as Value one of the Google Taxonmies. Higher order number are matches last.

product_type_by_category.label: Product Type by Category Map
product_type_by_category.comment: Values with empty order are matched last.

adwords_price_buckets.label: Adwords Price Buckets
adwords_price_buckets.comment: Create price ranges and apply labels to them. To be used with 'Adwords Price Buckets' directive in column map.

format_prices_locale.label: Format Prices
format_prices_locale.comment: Format price to current store locale. e.g. for fr_FR 1,000,000.99 will be 1.000.000,99

use_default_stock.label: Use default Stock Statuses
use_default_stock.comment: Fills 'availability' with 'in stock' or 'out of stock' depending on product's stock status. When set to 'No' a valid product attribute is required.

stock_attribute_code.label: Alternate Stock/Availability Attribute.
stock_attribute_code.comment: To fill 'availability'. The attribute's values can be: 'in stock', 'available for order', 'out of stock', 'preorder'. Other values will be replaced by 'out of stock'.

max_title_length.label: Max Length of Title
max_title_length.comment: Maximum length of title. Longer texts will be chunked. Recommended max length is 70. Set to empty, the title will not be chunked.

max_description_length.label: Max Length of Description
max_description_length.comment: Maximum length of description. Longer texts will be chunked. Recommended max length is 500-1000, but no longer than 10000. Set to empty, the description will not be chunked.

category_tree_include.label: Include products only from these categories

product_types.label: Submit only products of these types
product_types.comment: Products submitted to the feed have to be visible in Catalog, meaning visibility "Catalog", "Search", "Catalog, Search", but also "Not Visible Individually if they are part of a visible configurable".

attribute_sets.label: Submit only products that have these attribute sets
attribute_sets.comment: If you want to include All Attribute Sets, you can select only the first option; selecting the first option along with a few other sets won't include all sets.

map_replace_empty_columns.label: Replace empty values
map_replace_empty_columns.comment: Columns must exist in Columns Map. Save you config before looking for a new columns here. Grid has similar functions as Columns Map

find_and_replace.label: Find And Replace
find_and_replace.comment: Save your colums before adding rules here. The find & replace will apply at column output. The more rules you apply the slower your feed will be, not recommended for large catalogs.

skip_column_empty.label: Skip Products with empty
skip_column_empty.comment:
Avoid having empty values for your items in the feed.
Columns must exist in Columns Map, save your config before looking for columns here.

product_options.label: Product Options
product_options.comment: Specific configurations for simple products which vary by custom options.

options_mode.label: How to add product options
options_mode.comment: Product options can be detailed in the feed by adding them as a sigle row or multiple rows, one for each option.

vary_categories.label: Multiple rows only for products in these categories

configurable_products.label: Configurable products
configurable_products.comment: Specific configurations for configurable products and associated products of configurables.

associated_products_mode.label: How to add associated products
associated_products_mode.comment: Associated products can be added in the feed as separate items even if they are not visible in catalog.

add_out_of_stock.label: Allow Out of Stock
add_out_of_stock.comment: For associated products of configurable products.

inherit_parent_out_of_stock.label: Inherit parent Out of Stock status
inherit_parent_out_of_stock.comment: Forces "Out of Stock" for all sub-items when the configurable item is Out of Stock.

attribute_overwrites.label: Configurable attribute overwrites
attribute_overwrites.comment: Select the attributes of a configurable product that override the same attribute for the associated simple products.

associated_products_link_add_unique.label: Unique urls for associated products not visible
associated_products_link_add_unique.comment:
The new unique url will be formed from configurable product url and the configurable attributes values of the associated product.
e.g http://example.com/configuable.html?color=123&size=99

attribute_merge_value_separator.label: Associated Product Attribute Value Separator
attribute_merge_value_separator.comment: Variant attributes values like color and size, defined above, are been merged together for each item using the separator defined here.

grouped_products.label: Grouped products
grouped_products.comment: Specific configurations for grouped products and associated products of grouped products.

associated_products_mode.label: How to add associated products
associated_products_mode.comment: Associated products can be added in the feed as separate items even if they are not visible in catalog.

price_display_mode.label: Price Type
price_display_mode.comment:
'Minimal price' is the lowest associated product price.
'Sum of associated products prices' is the default quantity of each associated product multiplied with the price of the associated product and than summed together.

associated_products_link_add_unique.label: Unique urls for associated products not visible
associated_products_link_add_unique.comment:
The new unique url will be formed from grouped product url and the ids of the associated product.
e.g http://example.com/grouped.html?prod_id=123

associated_products_mode.label: How to add option products
associated_products_mode.comment: Bundle products are usually added as one item in the feed. Bundle sub-items could also be added.

combined_weight.label: Combined weight
combined_weight.comment: Bundle items can be defined as Dynamic or Fixed weight. This feature overwrites the bundle defintition and goes for Dynamic weight by computing weight as sum of all sub-items.

shipping.label: Shipping
shipping.comment:
By adding the shipping column to the feed the generation time will greatly increase.
It is recommended to test feed generation for 10/100 products using Test Feed Now button, before generating the feed for all products.
If it is possible, set your shipping prices only in your Google Merchant Account.

enabled.label: Enable Shipping Feature
enabled.comment: To enable shipping you must also add a column named shipping in Columns Map and assiged to the directive called 'Shipping'.

methods.label: Methods
methods.comment:
Allowed shipping methods.
Realtime carriers aren't allowed to avoid getting banned or to spam carriers' servers. e.g. UPS, USPS, FedEx, DHL, Royal Mail, ..
Please add/configure any realtime carriers in your Google Merchant account.

country.label: Countries
country.comment:
Shipping allowed countries.
Select only a few countries the avoid a very long feed generation and to keep the feed size to a minimnum.

by_region.label: Vary by Regions
by_region.comment:
Shipping price will vary by targeted regions.
Set to 'Yes' if any shipping method depends by regions.

country_with_region.label: Countries with Regions
country_with_region.comment:
Select for wich countries the shipping vary by regions. Countries selected must be in configuration 'Countries' above.
Improves feed generation speed.

only_minimum.label: Only Minimum Price
only_minimum.comment: If there are more carriers/shipping methods than the shipping column will be filled with only the minimum price and the related carrier/shipping method.

only_free_shipping.label: Only Free Shipping
only_free_shipping.comment: Add only free shipping when is available.

add_tax_to_price.label: Add Tax to Shipping Price
add_tax_to_price.comment: For US feeds column 'price' should not include tax.

format_prices_locale.label: Format Shipping Prices
format_prices_locale.comment: Format shipping price to current store locale. e.g. for fr_FR 1,000,000.99 will be 1.000.000,99

cache_enabled.label: Cache Shipping
cache_enabled.comment: Cache shipping data for every product.
